item.title: Madrid + Portugal
item.description: In June and July of this year, I made my way to Spain’s capital Madrid. I was picked up by a good friend of mine and got to stay at her shared apartment. She’d been living there for almost one year now as a student exchange via Erasmus. Certainly something I deeply regret not doing: why’d I miss my chance to live in another country for a year while studying?! A note for potential children: tell them to do this, urgently.
